I'd like to echo that this IS the full game, you don't need a previous version. Some other EE torrents out there are just the update-this is a standalone product.

This IS the full game, it's the DRM-free enhanced edition from GoG.com.

1. Mount the "sr-tw2aokee.iso" with Daemon Tools.
2. Run the "setup_the_witcher_2_ee_3.0.1.13-3.exe" file
3. Wait for it to check that the files are not corrupted or damaged, or skip the verification.
4. It will tell you that it needs 25Gb+ in the hard drive for installation. Just install or select where to install using the option button. 
5. Wait for it to install and play.

Another great torrent. Thanks extremezone. No worries, everything worked for me. 

I'm on Win7 x64.

Everything works great. Need a pretty good rig to run it on max with a decent frame rate, though. If your rig isn't that great, I'd recommend turning off things like shadow quality, SSAO, AA, motion blur and effects, v-sync, all the depth of field settings, and obviously ubersampling. Those are the settings which effect frame rate the most. You can set the rest to whatever you want with little to no frame rate change. Another thing you could also do is turn down the resolution. The lowest I would set it to is 1680x1050. The noticeable difference between that and 1920x1200 is very subtle, and will gain you a 10-15 (20-25 from 2560x1600) frame rate boost while still looking gorgeous. Hope this helps some people having difficulty running this game smoothly!

Regarding performance issues, please pull your heads from your asses.

TURN OFF ANTIALIASING!!!

Problem solved. Most of you cannot even tell the difference in visual quality anyway.

Or if you absolutely refuse to disable AA, turn it DOWN. you absolutely do not need 16x passes of AA. If any, you need 2x. And each pass means it has to do a boatload of work for each and every frame.

Try it and see for yourself. You can leave v-sync on and all the other details to relatively high settings, but AA KILLS FPS. Period.
